newsitem.title: THAILAND: Phatra Thanakit unaffected by baht float.
newsitem.headline: Phatra Thanakit unaffected by baht float.

text.p: Large Thai finance and securities firm Phatra Thanakit Plc was unaffected by the central bank's decision to float the baht on Wednesday, the company said in a statement on Friday.

Phatra said its own $315 million in foreign liabilities were protected from foreign exchange risk. It had advanced a further $58.40 million to clients which had assumed the risks themselves, the statement said.
Most clients had protected their loans against exchange fluctuations or had U.S. dollar revenues, Phatra said.
